entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
